body_html:
@jsondoo i tried creating conda create --name tensorflow python=3.5 but this error came:
"prefix already exists c:\Anaconda\envs\tensorflow" which makes sense, i dont understand how i can name it tensorflow when tensorflow is already installed via anaconda
